```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(plotly)
Drinking_Water <- read_csv("~/Desktop/Drinking_Water_Testing_Data_State_01-03-2022_0.csv")
head(Drinking_Water)
```

```{r}
PFOA_water <- Drinking_Water %>% filter(Contaminant == "PFOA") 
PFOA_water

#install.packages("usmap")
library(usmap) 
library(ggplot2) 

plot_usmap(regions = "counties") + 
  theme(panel.background=element_blank())

plot_usmap(data = PFOA_water, values = "Concentration") + 
  scale_fill_continuous(low = "white", high = "blue", name = "Concentration of Contamination", label = scales::comma) + +
  theme(legend.position = "right")
```
